name: polkadot-ui-monorepo
description: Polkadot UI components with CLI and registry server

scripts.publish:cli:patch: cd packages/cli && npm version patch && cd ../.. && pnpm --filter polkadot-ui publish --tag latest --no-git-checks
scripts.publish:cli:minor: cd packages/cli && npm version minor && cd ../.. && pnpm --filter polkadot-ui publish --tag latest --no-git-checks
scripts.publish:cli:major: cd packages/cli && npm version major && cd ../.. && pnpm --filter polkadot-ui publish --tag latest --no-git-checks

author: Polkadot UI Initiative
